title: Dokotoo Womens One Shoulder Sleeveless Ruffle Empire Waist Asymmetrical High-Low Bodycon Formal Wedding Guest Midi Dresses
description: Size: S=US 4-6 , M=US 8-10 , L=US 12-14 , XL=US 16-18 . Check more info in Size Chart and Product Description.
One shoulder dress with sleeveless, ruffle detail, empire waist, side zipper closure, asymmetrical high-low layer and solid color is stylish, elegant and sexy.
Bodycon dress is made of soft and stretch material to fit your body well. Well-made cut can shows beautiful body curves.
Such an adorable dress pairs with heels, handbag, necklace, earrings to catch everyone's eyes and get complements.
This midi dress is flattering in wedding guest, bridesmaid, cocktail, party, date, night out, prom and other formal, semi formal or casual occasions.
